Sentencas: Solar energy system is compatible with the ever-rising demands to switch from fossil fuels to renewable energy sources.
Titulo: Efficient path of distributed solar energy system synergetically combining photovoltaics with solar-syngas fuel cell

Sentencas: Here, a concentrating solar power system integrating photovoltaics and a solar-syngas-fuelled solid oxide fuel cell is proposed.
Titulo: Efficient path of distributed solar energy system synergetically combining photovoltaics with solar-syngas fuel cell

Sentencas: The concentrated sunlight is first absorbed by a spectrum selective nanofluid.
Titulo: Efficient path of distributed solar energy system synergetically combining photovoltaics with solar-syngas fuel cell

Sentencas: The ultraviolet and infrared solar spectrum bands of the concentrated sunlight are absorbed and converted into solar syngas through a thermochemical reaction.
Titulo: Efficient path of distributed solar energy system synergetically combining photovoltaics with solar-syngas fuel cell

Sentencas: The upgraded solar syngas is converted into electricity through solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Efficient path of distributed solar energy system synergetically combining photovoltaics with solar-syngas fuel cell

Sentencas: The visible and near-infrared sunlight band un-absorbed by nanofluid is transmitted and directly converted into electricity through concentrator photovoltaics.
Titulo: Efficient path of distributed solar energy system synergetically combining photovoltaics with solar-syngas fuel cell

Sentencas: In contrast to individual concentrator photovoltaics, this solar hybrid system can convert the ultraviolet and infrared solar spectrum bands to solar syngas instead of waste heat.
Titulo: Efficient path of distributed solar energy system synergetically combining photovoltaics with solar-syngas fuel cell

Sentencas: The nanofluid has the function of adjusting the output electricity share between the solid oxide fuel cell and the concentrator photovoltaics.
Titulo: Efficient path of distributed solar energy system synergetically combining photovoltaics with solar-syngas fuel cell

Sentencas: The simulation method of this type of solar hybrid system is described.
Titulo: Efficient path of distributed solar energy system synergetically combining photovoltaics with solar-syngas fuel cell

Sentencas: The conversion performance of the full spectrum solar energy converted into electricity is analysed for a typical system.
Titulo: Efficient path of distributed solar energy system synergetically combining photovoltaics with solar-syngas fuel cell

Sentencas: In particular, the complementary feature of the spectrum response is disclosed for the selected nanofluid.
Titulo: Efficient path of distributed solar energy system synergetically combining photovoltaics with solar-syngas fuel cell

Sentencas: The solar-to-electricity efficiency would be expected to be approximately 31.5% at a direct normal irradiation of 900 W/m(2).
Titulo: Efficient path of distributed solar energy system synergetically combining photovoltaics with solar-syngas fuel cell

Sentencas: An optimal particle size and volume fraction of the nanofluid are provided.
Titulo: Efficient path of distributed solar energy system synergetically combining photovoltaics with solar-syngas fuel cell

Sentencas: The results may provide a possibility of a new pathway to the high-efficiency of full solar spectrum utilization.
Titulo: Efficient path of distributed solar energy system synergetically combining photovoltaics with solar-syngas fuel cell
